Not recommended
Intermittent fetal 
heart rate auscultation 
18. Intermittent auscultation of the fetal heart rate with either 
a Doppler ultrasound device or Pinard fetal stethoscope is 
recommended for healthy pregnant women in labour.
Recommended
Epidural analgesia for 
pain relief
19. Epidural analgesia is recommended for healthy pregnant 
women requesting pain relief during labo
